attributes.action: Open inquiry into the deaths of benefit claimants since UC introduction
attributes.additional_details:
Too many homeless, destitute, hungry and without shelter.  
If there is humanity in people, let it be shown through their support of this injustice.
attributes.background: When people, who have worked for most of their adult lives, cannot get help in times of hardship there is something seriously wrong with the system.   I don't dispute the system needed to change but this is horrific - people dying of starvation and suicide in the 5th richest country...
